phrases: Thank you for taking care of me
Even though it is easy to say I love you
when you stand in front of me
my personality stands up and gets in my way.
I can usually pull through with my assertiveness
that is just how I am.
But no matter how hard I try, I cannot break the wall that is between us.
I want you to realise my feelings.
So I always send a gaze
of I really love you your way
After meeting you, I finally realised
that I am really clumsy when it comes to love.
The scars from love that I would almost forgotten
have started to ache all of a sudden.
Someday, like how I normally would...
I must say I love you, or else I will become even weaker.
Takasu-kun, you go left, I will go right!
Student Council President, they are running in the halls.
I will let them off this time.
What should I say when I catch her?
Taiga, you have always wanted to know, right?!
but I thought I should let you have him!
I thought to myself, If Taiga, my best friend, needs him...
but that was just my arrogance confusing me!
I said that my happiness does not depend on anyone but me, right?
Your happiness does not depend on anyone but yourself!
Let me see what you are going to do!
I thought you were crying for a second.
Well, I guess this is sort of a reward.
Remember when I talked about what I can see?
I told you my brother plays baseball, right?
I used to play baseball too.
To be honest, I was better than him,
but I could not keep playing because I am a girl.
That is why I plan to save money,
then get into a sports university and aim for the national softball league.
This is the happiness I chose and achieved!
But because I was obsessive about it, I decided to not to cry anymore.
Even if it is hard and painful, I have decided I will try my best.
If someone sees me go through hardship and pain, and then cry, I guess it is a reward.
That must be the present you wanted to give to me on Christmas Eve, right?
I am sorry, I really did not know at first.
I thought it was a present from Taiga.
Even though I decided not to take it...
I want to apologise for wearing it in front of you.
Where is that hairpin right now?
It is in my room, but -
You know, there is something else that I can see.
It is that you like Taiga.
All right, Takasu-kun, this is a giant goodbye.
Run towards the thing that you can see!
I knew you would come to work, even though you ran away.
Do not laugh at me, please.
I have something to tell you after work.
If... If I want to run away again,
you have to hold on to me.
What can you do by yourself?
Thank you for always taking care of her.
From now on, she will be staying with -
Like hell I would stay with you, that man, and that brat!
I do not get this at all.
I am the one who does not get this!
You promised you would not work,
but you lied and broke that promise!
You fainted because you pushed yourself too much for my sake.
That is why I am working in your place!
Because we are a family, we should help each other out -
I just want you to concentrate on your studies!
I want you to find something you want to do and live a good life -
Who is the one who did not concentrate on their studies?!
The one who could not do what they want and failed in life...
Quit forcing your failures on me!
That shitty old man's business failed, and he ran away.
Then he told my real mum to take care of me.
But she already has a new family,
so their child will definitely have long legs.
How can I fit in with a family like that?
If I were there, I would only make everything awkward.
It is the same at the shitty old man's place.
I have always thought of this...
If I had never been born, Yasuko would definitely have a better life.
She is still young, so she could probably redo high school...
They bring others trouble because of their own problems.
I am still a child, after all.
That is right, if I had never been born -
Do not look down on life!
I think you are misunderstanding something.
What can you solve by doing that?
How could you say something as naIve as that?!
It is exactly what you were saying!
It is all because you are here!
no matter who you spend your life with,
I just want to be able to see you, Takasu Ryuuji!
That is why you cannot say things like, If only I had never been born!
W-What the hell do you mean?!
Are you trying to kill me?!
You really dwell on trivial things, huh?
I am not good with horoscopes, but roast lamb is good.
I am not talking about that!
I will be eighteen in two months!
I will run away from Yasuko and the others.
and then I will sleep and wake up, and then I will run until it is my birthday.
That way, we will both be adults.
No one will get in our way.
My life will be yours until I die!
Did not I tell you to listen to what I have to say first?
Proposing should be left to guys!
Listen to me, I made a promise with Minorin.
I promised to show her what I will do.
T-Then, let us say it together...
Who the hell is calling at such an important time?
Let us keep going, it is getting cold here...
Hey Takasu, what the heck are you doing?
Your mum and Aisaka's mum are searching everywhere for you guys!
Whatever, just come to where I tell you to.
Why are you two all wet?
Why are we meeting at your house?
Your mothers have not come here yet.
My aunt is not here today, so come in.
You will catch a cold if you stay in those clothes.
I cannot believe I am troubling you.
Oh yeah, Yuusaku said he will bring you a change of clothes.
Anyway, I am sorry for bothering you.
You are the one who forced me to say it!
Kitamura, I am sorry for bothering you.
Anyway, what are you guys planning to do now?
Running away, and then getting married?
That is too fast of a development!
After Ryuuji turns eighteen, we will -
Moreover, where will you be living?
We will stay in a business hotel, or maybe even a manga cafe for now...
Do you plan to live like that forever?
No, well, after I come back...
Do you think you can come back?
Just imagine search parties looking for you,
and everyone at school finding out...
You two might even get expelled.
All the things I want just end up breaking.
That is why I decided to not desire anything.
That is why I want to break this all the things I want just end up breaking jinx.
No, I have to break it.
These are my savings that I always hold onto.
I do not think your actions are correct.
I do not think I will be able to approve of them either.
But, if this is what you want to do, I have no right to object to it.
You have to pay me back one day.
This is the key to my villa.
You have been there already, so you should know how to get there.
Minorin has some things to discuss with Amin.
See you again, Minorin, Stupid Chi'.
What do you have to discuss with me?
I feel so weak that I cannot even stand anymore...
You wanted to show me your crying face?
Crying is a nosebleed of the heart...
Because Taiga took Takasu-kun away from you?
I am not even sure myself...
Even though I decided to never cry again...
If you trip while running down a hallway, you will get a nosebleed.
If you trip in life, you will cry.
It is still too early for us to be talking about life.
From now on, for ten years, for twenty years, for sixty years,
You have to run out once you have got your things.
Do not worry, I can do it.
Remember to bring your hair dryer!
I do not want to carry too much.
Do not bring too much light clothing.
It will just be dead weight.
Come out right after you are done!
If something happens, call me immediately!
Show them this watch and they will understand.
She called at dawn saying she will be taking a vacation.
I will still be a kid.
You have been showing it off since yesterday.
Just how long do you plan to show it off for?
Were not you the one who said that school is not a place for trading chocolate?
Did they catch a cold together?
You are not going to see them off?
Regardless how strong a will she has,
she broke down after being dumped by both Taiga and Takasu-kun.
Why do I have to have a snowball fight with -
Since it is food for running away, I picked something more mature.
Look, cigar chocolate, chicken wafers and -
Should not you buy lunch from train stations when you run away?
She only cares about her own reputation.
I do not think she will make a big fuss out of it.
I will only say it now because we are running away...
You know, when Ya-chan said we are a family of three,
You know what my family is like.
So when we are really becoming a family like this,
No, I do not mean that!
It will not be goodbye forever!
It is not that I do not want to run away with you...
I think it is great, but...
I am your grandchild, Takasu Ryuuji.
We are not escaping, we are...
Ryuuji showed me his method of dealing with it.
Do not get mad at me.
